page.title: 16SPECTATOR SPORTS, S.LEEDS
page.content: With Elland Road Football Stadium, the home of Leeds United Football Club, being in our survey area we thought it would be interesting to find out how many local people visited the ground to watch soccer. We found from our survey that only that only 40% of those we interviewed watched any live sport at all. Of these people only 38% watched soccer and 48% watched rugby league. There are about 10 rugby league teams in the area including Hunslet who are a professional team.Hunslet now Share Elland Road Stadium with Leeds United and have done since the start of the 1983/84 season.This is possible because soccer is played on Saturday and Rugby on Sunday. Perhaps people have been put off attending soccer matches because of crowd trouble at soccer games.
